meanings.definition: Excessively or irrationally devoted to a particular object or activity.
meanings.sent1: She had a fetishistic love for collecting seashells.
meanings.sent2: His fetishistic obsession with vintage cars consumed all his free time.
meanings.sent3: It was almost comical how fetishistic she was about organizing her bookshelf.
meanings.sent4: Her fetishistic attachment to her childhood teddy bear was endearing.
meanings.sent5: The way he meticulously arranged his action figures was truly fetishistic.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of fetishism.
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting had a fetishistic theme running through it.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of fetishistic artifacts from different cultures.
meanings.sent3: It was interesting to see how the movie portrayed a fetishistic ritual.
meanings.sent4: The novel had a fetishistic charm that captivated readers.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer's latest collection had a fetishistic edge to it.

meanings.definition: Showing an excessive or irrational devotion to a particular object or activity.
meanings.sent1: His fetishistic behavior towards his lucky charm was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The singer's fans had a fetishistic admiration for her signature hat.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to watch his fetishistic attachment to his favorite pen.
meanings.sent4: Her fetishistic dedication to her morning routine was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The chef's fetishistic attention to detail made his dishes stand out.
